## Introduction

The rapid rise of **AI-powered careers** has left many job seekers wondering: **"Should I pivot towards AI, or are traditional careers still viable?"**  

This section provides a **data-driven roadmap** for career success in 2024, including **in-demand skills, high-paying roles, and resume optimization strategies**.

## 2Ô∏è‚É£ Interactive Visualization: AI vs. Non-AI Job Salaries

üìä **Explore the salary differences across AI and non-AI careers below.**  

```{r}
import pandas as pd
import plotly.express as px

# Sample Salary Data for AI vs. Non-AI Careers
data = {
    "Job Role": ["Machine Learning Engineer", "Data Scientist", "AI Risk Analyst", 
                 "Software Developer", "Mechanical Engineer", "Customer Service Rep"],
    "AI-Powered": ["Yes", "Yes", "Yes", "No", "No", "No"],
    "Average Salary ($)": [140000, 125000, 118000, 95000, 85000, 45000]
}

df = pd.DataFrame(data)

# Create Interactive Bar Chart
fig = px.bar(df, x="Job Role", y="Average Salary ($)", color="AI-Powered",
             title="AI vs. Non-AI Job Salaries in 2024",
             labels={"Job Role": "Career Path", "Average Salary ($)": "Annual Salary ($)"},
             barmode="group")

fig.show()
